# Model Exchange Framework (MXF)

> MXF is a multi-agent AI orchestration framework built with TypeScript, Bun, Socket.IO, and MongoDB. It provides real-time WebSocket communication, 100+ MCP tools, an ORPAR cognitive control loop, multi-scope memory with semantic search, task DAG workflows, knowledge graphs, and optional TensorFlow.js integration for on-device ML. Agents connect via the TypeScript SDK and collaborate through channels with AES-256-GCM encrypted messaging.

## Getting Started

- [Getting Started Guide](getting-started.md): Installation, first agent, multi-agent systems
- [Deployment Guide](deployment.md): Docker Compose stack deployment with MongoDB, Meilisearch, Redis
- [Glossary](glossary.md): Key terms and definitions
- [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md): Common issues, debug mode, logging
- [Use Cases](use-cases.md): Real-world application scenarios

## SDK Reference

- [SDK Overview](sdk/index.md): TypeScript SDK entry point — MxfClient, MxfAgent, event handlers, managers
- [Authentication](sdk/authentication.md): Domain keys, access tokens, agent key generation
- [Configuration Manager](sdk/config-manager.md): Feature toggles, LLM model selection, agent types
- [SDK Managers](sdk/managers.md): MCP, Memory, Prompt, and Task manager classes
- [SDK Handlers](sdk/handlers.md): Control loop, tool, messaging, and task handlers
- [Event System](sdk/events.md): Event-driven architecture and event categories
- [MCP Integration](sdk/mcp.md): Tool execution and external MCP server registration
- [External MCP Servers](sdk/external-mcp-servers.md): Registering external MCP servers (global and channel-scoped)
- [Core Interfaces](sdk/interfaces.md): TypeScript type definitions
- [MXP Configuration](sdk/mxp-config.md): MXP protocol optimization settings
- [Code Examples](sdk/examples.md): Practical SDK usage patterns

- [Tasks API](api/tasks.md): Task creation, assignment, tracking
- [Memory API](api/memory.md): Multi-scope memory persistence
- [Authentication API](api/auth.md): JWT and API key authentication
- [WebSocket Events](api/websocket.md): Socket.IO event reference
- [Control Loop API](api/control-loop.md): ORPAR cycle management
- [MCP API](api/mcp.md): Model Context Protocol tool execution
- [Prompt Assembly](api/prompt-assembly.md): ORPAR phase-aware prompt construction
- [DAG Tools API](api/dag-tools.md): Task DAG workflow tools
- [Knowledge Graph Tools API](api/knowledge-graph-tools.md): KG entity and relationship tools
- [Config API](api/config.md): System configuration
- [Users API](api/users.md): User account management
- [Dashboard API](api/dashboard.md): Dashboard-specific endpoints
- [Analytics API](api/analytics.md): Performance metrics
- [Proactive Validation API](api/proactive-validation.md): Pre-execution validation
- [Auto-Correction API](api/auto-correction.md): Intelligent parameter correction
- [Validation Analytics API](api/validation-analytics.md): Validation performance metrics

- [Architecture Overview](mxf/index.md): Modular service-oriented architecture

- [Data Flow](mxf/data-flow.md): How data moves through the system
- [Server Services](mxf/server-services.md): Core, AI, task, MCP, and pattern services
- [Security](mxf/security.md): Four security levels, authentication, AES-256-GCM encryption
- [Extensibility](mxf/extensibility.md): Plugin and extension development

- [Database Abstraction](mxf/database-abstraction.md): Swappable database backends
- [Server CLI](mxf/server-cli.md): Server command-line interface

## ORPAR & Memory Systems

- [ORPAR Control Loop](mxf/orpar.md): Observation, Reasoning, Planning, Action, Reflection cycle
- [Memory Utility Learning (MULS)](mxf/memory-utility-learning.md): Q-value weighted retrieval with phase-specific lambdas
- [ORPAR-Memory Integration](mxf/orpar-memory-integration.md): Phase-to-strata routing, surprise-driven re-observation
- [Nested Learning](mxf/nested-learning.md): Multi-timescale memory consolidation
- [Meilisearch Integration](meilisearch-integration.md): Semantic search setup and configuration

## Advanced Systems

- [Task DAG & Knowledge Graph](features/dag-knowledge-graph.md): DAG workflows and KG operations
- [Code Execution](mxf/code-execution.md): Secure Docker-sandboxed execution
- [Workflow System](mxf/workflow-system.md): Sequential, parallel, and loop workflow patterns
- [LSP Integration](mxf/lsp-integration.md): Language Server Protocol bridge for code intelligence
- [P2P Foundation](mxf/p2p-foundation.md): Decentralized agent coordination
- [System LLM](mxf/system-llm.md): AI-powered task assignment and reasoning
- [Validation System](mxf/validation-system.md): Proactive validation and error prevention
- [Agentic Model Guide](mxf/agentic-model-guide.md): Guide for building agentic models

- [Dynamic Inference Parameters](mxf/dynamic-inference-parameters.md): Complexity-based model selection
- [TOON Optimization](mxf/toon-optimization.md): Token-optimized encoding
- [Prompt Auto-Compaction](mxf/prompt-auto-compaction.md): Automatic prompt compression
- [MCP Prompts](mxf/mcp-prompts.md): MCP prompt template system
